channel.title: Coords
channel.description:
i need to get coddinates of where im standing or walking i was already tryed ::mypos and other stuff in run tab it isnt too so can some one help making in run tab coords in wight carried place... i need it cuz i have to make a pkbox in game..:D
so help please..:D

item.title: Coords
item.dc:creator: @Kaligrok Kaligrok
item.description:
@Kaligrok wrote:

If you use silab, it shows the coords in the emote tab. If you are using a diffrent client, move your charachter to a spot you want, log out, go into the charachter file and look at the coords. If you do not understand PM me.

Read full topic
